display_name: Rutter Childrens Behaviour Questionnaire (RCBQ): Total score
description:
Calculated - Total score based on 24 items from Rutter Childrens Behaviour Questionnaire (RCBQ). Sum of all responses to items 1 through 24. Higher scores indicate higher levels of behavioral problems. [Rutter M., 1967 (PubMed ID: 6033260)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/6033260/)

[Search for all Rutter Childrens Behaviour Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=rcbq)
